data.title: FREE Clean Structural Clay - 10 loads
data.description:
80-100 yards of clean, structural clay, available for free. Located in Lombard near Roosevelt & Westmore/Meyers 
We will deliver minimum of 10 yard loads to your job site at no charge ONLY within Lombard 60148/Villa Park 60181/Addison 60101 area. ...

data.title: FREE Regina Electric Broom for Handyman or Collector
data.description:
When I needed a vacuum cleaner for a studio apartment in 1978, I bought a Regina Electric Broom. It's harvest gold, with a pretty pop art design on the bag. 
The dirt empties into a cup, not a disposable bag. You dump the dirt from the cup into your  ...
